metadata.designed_for: Thomas - Few hours trading, out before close, trend + range

core_principles: Always exit before market close (5 PM ET / 23:00 CET)
Trade only 2-4 hours per day (London-NY overlap preferred)
With trend on higher timeframe, range scalp on lower
Risk max 1% per trade on $150k account = $1500 max risk

opening_range_breakout.name: Opening Range Breakout (ORB)
opening_range_breakout.description: Trade breakout of first 15-30 min range after 9:30 AM ET
entry_rules: Wait for first 15-30 min to establish range
Mark high and low of range
Enter on break above high (long) or below low (short)
Daily bias should align (use daily trend)
exit_rules: Time stop: Exit by 12:00 PM ET if target not hit
filters: Avoid on major news days (CPI, NFP) - too volatile
Range should be 0.3-0.6x daily ATR for quality
opening_range_breakout.edge: NY open brings fresh volume and often establishes day's direction

london_breakout.name: London Session Breakout
london_breakout.description: Trade breakout from Asian session range at London open
entry_rules: Identify Asian session high/low (7 PM - 3 AM ET)
At London open (3 AM ET), wait for clean break
Enter on first 15min close beyond Asian range
exit_rules: Target 1: Asian range height projected from breakout
filters: Asian range should be relatively tight (< 0.5x ATR)
Check daily trend direction - trade with it
london_breakout.edge: Asian consolidation often precedes London expansion

range_scalp.name: Intraday Range Scalp
range_scalp.description: Scalp between clearly defined support/resistance in ranging market

range_criteria: Price has touched support/resistance 2+ times each
Range has held for at least 30 min
Range width is 15-40 ticks (optimal for scalping)

entry_rules: Long: At support with bullish reversal candle (hammer, engulfing)
Short: At resistance with bearish reversal candle
Confirm with volume spike at level (rejection)
risk_management: If range breaks, DO NOT average in
Can reverse if breakout is clean
range_scalp.edge: High probability when range is clearly defined

trend_pullback.name: Trend Pullback Entry
trend_pullback.description: Enter with trend on pullback to key level

trend_identification: 1H/4H showing clear higher highs/lows (uptrend) or lower highs/lows (downtrend)
pullback_criteria: Pullback to prior breakout level (support becomes resistance)

entry_rules: Wait for bullish/bearish engulfing at pullback zone
Enter on close of reversal candle
Or enter on break of pullback swing high/low
exit_rules: Target 2: 1.5x distance from entry to swing
trend_pullback.edge: Trading with momentum, entering at discount

liquidity_grab_fade.name: Liquidity Grab Fade (Stop Hunt)
liquidity_grab_fade.description: Fade false breakouts that grab liquidity above/below obvious levels

setup: Clear level where stops are clustered (obvious high/low)

entry_rules: Wait for price to return inside prior range
Enter on first candle close back inside
Aggressive: Enter immediately on rejection wick
exit_rules: Stop: Beyond the false breakout high/low
Tight stop acceptable due to clear invalidation
liquidity_grab_fade.edge: Fading retail stop hunts, institutional entry zones

indicators: Clear higher highs/lows or lower highs/lows

pre_session: Check economic calendar for high-impact events
Calculate position size based on planned stop
during_session: Wait for clear setup - no FOMO entries
